experience: You and Mark both know Cody McGinley, Sylvia Kubiak, and 5 others
You both worked at Charles Schwab
Mark worked at Charles Schwab before you started

Architect, design and develop new Wpf application as well as maintain and add features for legacy WinForms application.  Technologies include Wpf, Mvvm, C#, WinForms, Wcf, Styles and ControlTemplates.
RsWorx provides software services for architecture, design and development of business applications.  We specialize in WPF, Silverlight, C#, Databases and Web Services.

Summary:  Design, develop and maintain a large network monitoring and ticketing system for this start-up Network Management Company.  This includes backend monitoring, data management, communication layer, user interface and company website -including back end systems for orders, installations and licensing.  Technologies:  Visual Studio 2010, WPF, WCF, Expression Blend, Expression Design, SqlServer 9, LinqToSql, LINQ, .NET 3.5, .NET 2.0, NUnit, Log4net; Snoop  and Cruise Control.Net.  I am very comfortable writing XAML with or without designer mode or Expression Blend and modifying creating styles and control templates.Products:Nstrument Manager - A Client/Server network monitoring application providing real-time monitoring and reporting for your network infrastructure.  Includes ticketing for when thresholds are exceeded and completely integrated network tools like Port Switch Mapper, Trace Route, Trap Sender and Receiver, MIB Browser and WMI Browser (all written by us in C#/WPF) to aide in trouble shooting.  Client/Server Communication utilizes WCF and Network Monitoring utilizes ICMP, SNMP, WMI and HTTP.  The User interface has over 100 User Controls and uses the Avalon Dock Layout Manager, MS WPF Toolkit, a custom Chart Control and heavy Data Binding to make use of WPF.  The user interface also utilizes Async operations to keep it responsive, settings to remember user actions and has a rich WPF look to set us apart from competitors.SNMP Library / Free MIB Browser - The .Net SNMP Library sends and receives UDP packets for those wishing to write their own SNMP programs.  It is multi-threaded, exposes an Async API and uses strongly typed objects so you can use LINQ to query them.  The free MIB Browser is a scaled down version 1 of the Nstrument Manager MIB Browser.  It provides basic read only Gets, Table Walks and includes over 1200 MIBs.
Created a caching system for search results to remove load from the database and speed up search times.  Technologies included C#, AppFabric, WCF, IIS and Perfmon for instrumentation.
Develop and maintain the Silverlight front-end for an application whitelisting security product.

Mark was the champion senior developer at Schwab. He is fluent in software and has excellent communication skills. His analytical and problem solving skills are out of the world. Some of the hardest problems were thrown in Marks direction over the course of the project and he came out shining on the other end every time. By helping with Charting solutions and Grids, Mark laid the foundation for a large part of the application at Schwab. He is a solid architect with a great work ethic and will be a great asset to any team that gets a chance to hire him.
